name: New ways of delivering self-build housing
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session covers self-build on different scales and involving different viability models.  With several case studies, this session looks at a variety of approaches and asks what are the secrets to their success and as leading case studies for self-build housing, how do they influence the self-build landscape of the future?

presentations.name: Overview of different housing models across Britain
presentations.speakers: Ted Stevens, Chairman, National Self-Build Association (NASBA)

presentations.name: Community land trusts in practice
presentations.speakers: Alan Fox, Director, Cornwall Community Land Trust (CCLT)

presentations.name: Local authority case study: Build! ®
presentations.speakers: Helen Town, Strategic Housing Officer, Cherwell District Council

presentations.name: Case study: Lancaster co-housing
presentations.speakers: Jon Sear, Founding Director, Lancaster Co-housing
